sentences: Kas sa tahad midagi juua? See jook on väga hea.
context: The Estonian word 'jook' is a noun that refers to any liquid beverage or drink meant for consumption. It can refer to water, juice, soda, alcohol, or any other type of drink. The word is in singular form and would have different endings when declined in cases (genitive: jooki, partitive: jooki, etc.).
